title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8191-2.2 - Alternative reporting procedure for transmittal of reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8191-2.2 - Alternative reporting procedure for transmittal of reports

State Regulations
A county recording officer and assessor may jointly submit
an alternate reporting procedure for approval by ORPTS. The proposed procedure
shall specify the form and manner of reporting, title of the person responsible
for each step in the process and an implementation schedule. An alternate
reporting procedure may not be implemented without prior approval by
ORPTS. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8191-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
